import React from 'react'; import './HeroSection.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaCalendar, FaExternalLinkAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; function ExperienceSection({ lightBg, topLine, lightText, lightTextDesc, headline, description, description2, experienceLink, img, alt, imgStart, }) { return ( <>
{topLine}

{headline}

@ {description}

{description2}

{experienceLink}

) } export default ExperienceSection
